formulas.name: WaitingForBuyerWireTaskSubject
formulas.expression: "Wire should be coming in for $" + TEXT({!$Record.Pro_Forma_Price_Sent__c}) + ". Once received, move opp to delivering (if we are doing freight) or closed won stage"

Flow.label: Opportunity - multiple updates on name primary contact contact

recordCreates.name: task_for_Adding_wire_info_to_QBO
recordCreates.label: task for Adding wire info to QBO

value.stringValue: Add wire transfer collateral to QBO transaction
Ensure all revenue and expense transactions for unit are added as URT and added to QBO
Coordinate pickup / delivery with buyer and site contact. Coordinate transportation if needed.

recordCreates.name: task_for_Ensuring_GP_is_accurate
recordCreates.label: task for Ensuring GP is accurate

value.stringValue: Update Opp GP to reflect correct GP amount

recordCreates.name: task_for_Review_Won_Opp_follow_up
recordCreates.label: task for Review/Won Opp follow up

value.stringValue: Won opp follow-up & review request. If good review, task Sales Admin to post positive review on FB/Social Media.
Send Paid Invoice to buyer, copy opp owner; call buyer and introduce self as the transport/logistics contact.

recordCreates.name: task_for_Sold_post_on_FB_LI
recordCreates.label: task for Sold post on FB/LI

value.stringValue: Post a picture of this unit on a truck, or a picture of it with a "SOLD" stamp on it, to Zadoon's FB AND LinkedIn Pages. Create tasks for CM and HB to post on their FB/LinkedIn pages.

recordCreates.name: task_for_Watch_for_wire_in_move_opp_to_closed_won_or_delivering_stage
recordCreates.label: task for Watch for wire in, move opp to closed/won or delivering stage
